review_data.title: Perfect place for a quiet breakfast
review_data.content: Lovely café with lovely waiters. The portions were generous and the quality of the scrambled eggs and croissant was good. Best breakfast place in the neighborhood.

review_data.title: Easy und freundliches Café
review_data.content: Lockeres und luftiges Café mit guten Cappuccino. Direkt neben dem Transa - Outdoor - Outlet. Schnelle und freundliche Bedienung.

review_data.title: Zufrieden
review_data.content: Das Essen war gut, schnelle Bedienung. Das Unterhalten im Restaurant ist etwas schwierig, da es etwas zu laut ist.

review_data.title: Really quiet early morning spot

review_data.title: A great place to have a drink and a casual meal
review_data.content: Nice bench seating on the street creates a casual environment that is perfect for meeting friends. Solid hearty meals with a traditional Swiss feel.

review_data.title: Perfect place for Brunch
review_data.content: Gloria is the perfect place for an ample brunch in the heart of Zurich. The choice from set meals and from single items to compose your individual breakfast is extensive. Bread, cheese, meat, fruit etc. are fresh and nicely arranged. The croissants are the best...More

review_data.title: Handy location near the central train station
review_data.content: Food was good, service was okay. The size of portions varied enormously depending on what you ordered (the wraps seemed to be above average in size, the antipasta dishes tiny). There is a book exchange shelf near the door when you enter which is great!...More
